english.segment1: I've been infected with the latest disease. An Epidemic thats infecting the weak. It doesnt matter how I plead. Because cant escape it
english.segment2: Whoa Its my temptation. Whoa Its so contagious
english.segment3: Theres something wrong with me. Inside Im wanting to be free. But the more I give the more. Consuming it just seems to be. I know its what I need. To find a cure for this disease. To save me from all of my self deprecation
english.segment4: Is there way to clean the sin off of me. Is there anyone with a vaccine. Ill take the shot even if I bleed. As long as it can heal me
english.segment5: I will do whatever I need. To uncontaminate and then proceed. Is it too late to forgive and forget. Can someone help me
english.segment6: There only is one cure. That is why I pray. Jesus please take it away
